00159 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00160 l4_debugger_switch_log_u(l4_cap_idx_t cap, const char *name, int on_off,
00161                          l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW;
00162 
00163 enum
00164 {
00165   L4_DEBUGGER_NAME_SET_OP         = 0UL,
00166   L4_DEBUGGER_GLOBAL_ID_OP        = 1UL,
00167   L4_DEBUGGER_KOBJ_TO_ID_OP       = 2UL,
00168   L4_DEBUGGER_QUERY_LOG_TYPEID_OP = 3UL,
00169   L4_DEBUGGER_SWITCH_LOG_OP       = 4UL,
00170   L4_DEBUGGER_NAME_GET_OP         = 5UL,
00171   L4_DEBUGGER_QUERY_LOG_NAME_OP   = 6UL,
00172 };
00173 
00174 enum
00175 {
00176   L4_DEBUGGER_SWITCH_LOG_ON  = 1,
00177   L4_DEBUGGER_SWITCH_LOG_OFF = 0,
00178 };
00179 
00180 /* IMPLEMENTATION -----------------------------------------------------------*/
00181 
00182 #include <l4/sys/kernel_object.h>
00183 
00184 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00185 l4_debugger_set_object_name_u(unsigned long cap,
00186                               const char *name, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00187 {
00188   unsigned int i;
00189   char *s = (char *)&l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[1];
00190   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_DEBUGGER_NAME_SET_OP;
00191   for (i = 0;
00192        *name && i < (L4_UTCB_GENERIC_DATA_SIZE - 2) * sizeof(l4_umword_t) - 1;
00193        ++i, ++name, ++s)
00194     *s = *name;
00195   *s = 0;
00196   i = (i + sizeof(l4_umword_t) - 1) / sizeof(l4_umword_t);
00197   return l4_invoke_debugger(cap, l4_msgtag(0, i, 0, 0), utcb);
00198 }
00199 
00200 L4_INLINE unsigned long
00201 l4_debugger_global_id_u(l4_cap_idx_t cap, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00202 {
00203   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_DEBUGGER_GLOBAL_ID_OP;
00204   if (l4_error_u(l4_invoke_debugger(cap, l4_msgtag(0, 1, 0, 0), utcb), utcb))
00205     return ~0UL;
00206   return l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0];
00207 }
00208 
00209 L4_INLINE unsigned long
00210 l4_debugger_kobj_to_id_u(l4_cap_idx_t cap, l4_addr_t kobjp, l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00211 {
00212   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_DEBUGGER_KOBJ_TO_ID_OP;
00213   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[1] = kobjp;
00214   if (l4_error_u(l4_invoke_debugger(cap, l4_msgtag(0, 2, 0, 0), utcb), utcb))
00215     return ~0UL;
00216   return l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0];
00217 }
00218 
00219 L4_INLINE int
00220 l4_debugger_query_log_typeid_u(l4_cap_idx_t cap, const char *name,
00221                                unsigned idx,
00222                                l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00223 {
00224   unsigned l;
00225   int e;
00226   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_DEBUGGER_QUERY_LOG_TYPEID_OP;
00227   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[1] = idx;
00228   l = __builtin_strlen(name);
00229   l = l > 31 ? 31 : l;
00230   __builtin_strncpy((char *)&l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[2], name, 31);
00231   l = (l + 1 + sizeof(l4_umword_t) - 1) / sizeof(l4_umword_t);
00232   e = l4_error_u(l4_invoke_debugger(cap, l4_msgtag(0, 2 + l, 0, 0), utcb), utcb);
00233   if (e < 0)
00234     return e;
00235   return l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0];
00236 }
00237 
00238 L4_INLINE int
00239 l4_debugger_query_log_name_u(l4_cap_idx_t cap, unsigned idx,
00240                              char *name, unsigned namelen,
00241                              char *shortname, unsigned shortnamelen,
00242                              l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00243 {
00244   int e;
00245   char *n;
00246   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_DEBUGGER_QUERY_LOG_NAME_OP;
00247   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[1] = idx;
00248   e = l4_error_u(l4_invoke_debugger(cap, l4_msgtag(0, 2, 0, 0), utcb), utcb);
00249   if (e < 0)
00250     return e;
00251   n = (char *)&l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0];
00252   __builtin_strncpy(name, n, namelen);
00253   name[namelen - 1] = 0;
00254   __builtin_strncpy(shortname, n + __builtin_strlen(n) + 1, shortnamelen);
00255   shortname[shortnamelen - 1] = 0;
00256   return 0;
00257 }
00258 
00259 
00260 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00261 l4_debugger_switch_log_u(l4_cap_idx_t cap, const char *name, int on_off,
00262                          l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00263 {
00264   unsigned l;
00265   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_DEBUGGER_SWITCH_LOG_OP;
00266   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[1] = on_off;
00267   l = __builtin_strlen(name);
00268   l = l > 31 ? 31 : l;
00269   __builtin_strncpy((char *)&l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[2], name, 31);
00270   l = (l + 1 + sizeof(l4_umword_t) - 1) / sizeof(l4_umword_t);
00271   return l4_invoke_debugger(cap, l4_msgtag(0, 2 + l, 0, 0), utcb);
00272 }
00273 
00274 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00275 l4_debugger_get_object_name_u(l4_cap_idx_t cap, unsigned id,
00276                               char *name, unsigned size,
00277                               l4_utcb_t *utcb) L4_NOTHROW
00278 {
00279   l4_msgtag_t t;
00280   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0] = L4_DEBUGGER_NAME_GET_OP;
00281   l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[1] = id;
00282   t = l4_invoke_debugger(cap, l4_msgtag(0, 2, 0, 0), utcb);
00283   __builtin_strncpy(name, (char *)&l4_utcb_mr_u(utcb)->mr[0], size);
00284   name[size - 1] = 0;
00285   return t;
00286 }
00287

00289 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00290 l4_debugger_set_object_name(unsigned long cap,
00291                             const char *name) L4_NOTHROW
00292 {
00293   return l4_debugger_set_object_name_u(cap, name, l4_utcb());
00294 }

00297 l4_debugger_global_id(l4_cap_idx_t cap) L4_NOTHROW
00298 {
00299   return l4_debugger_global_id_u(cap, l4_utcb());
00300 }
